name: Werewolves 2
description:
Werewolves 2 is a direct continuation from the last critically acclaimed game.

After you found the Ritual's Poem, you decide to take action against the Beast that was causing all the horrors from the past.

Survive the beast. Complete the ritual.

How to play

WASD - Move
Q - Switch between Lamp/Gun
Left Mouse - Fire
E - Interact
